title: How to Apply Rain X Automobile Windshield Treatment

steps.title: Wash your car normally.
steps.content: Wash your car normally. If you thoroughly clean and prep the windshield surface before applying, this step can be skipped. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Dry your windshield.
steps.content: Dry your windshield. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Apply Rain-x to half of the windshield at a time.
steps.content: Apply Rain-x to half of the windshield at a time. Apply Rain-X with a soft cloth (preferably microfiber cloth), and in a circular motion, firmly apply Rain-X into the windshield.

steps.title: Buff with a different clean cloth.
steps.content: Buff with a different clean cloth. Move up the windshield, gradually buffing out the haze, until you get to the top of the glass. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Take a clean cloth and go over all the surfaces one last time, buffing in circles rubbing off the last residue.
steps.content: Take a clean cloth and go over all the surfaces one last time, buffing in circles rubbing off the last residue. [4] X Research source
